Package me.shoutto.sdk.internal.http

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    StmEntityRequestAsyncProcessor
    Interface for async HTTP request processors
    StmHttpResponseAdapter<T extends StmBaseEntity>
    Interface for adapting a JSON response from the Shout to Me service to a Shout to Me entity
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultUrlProvider
    Implementation of URL provider for Shout to Me API service endpoints
    GsonDateAdapter
    GsonDateAdapter is used by Gson to convert Dates to/from UTC.
    GsonRequestAdapter
    Gson adapter for converting Shout to Me entities to JSON objects
    GsonResponseAdapter<T extends StmBaseEntity>
    GsonAdapter for converting JSON from Shout to Me service to Shout to Me entity objects
    StmEntityListRequestSync<T extends StmBaseEntity>
    This class GETs, POSTs, or PUTs a list of entities from the Shout to Me API
    StmEntityRequestSync<T extends StmBaseEntity>
    This class is used to make HTTP requests for Shout to Me entity objects.
    StmHttpSender  
    StmRequestQueue  
    VolleyRequestProcessor<T extends StmBaseEntity>
    Volley based HTTP request processor
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    HttpMethod
    Supported HTTP methods for the Shout to Me API service
